name: Chocolate Dry Fruit Cake
Description: Chocolate Dry Fruit Cake is a rich and indulgent delight that perfectly blends the deep, velvety taste of chocolate with the natural sweetness and crunch of assorted dry fruits.

name: Sourdough Pizza
Description: Sourdough Pizza is a flavorful twist on the classic, made with naturally fermented sourdough starter instead of commercial yeast. The slow fermentation process gives the crust a unique tangy flavor, airy texture, and crisp golden edges.

name: Nan Khatai
Description: Nankhatai is a classic Indian shortbread cookie that melts in your mouth with every bite. Made from a simple blend of flour, ghee, sugar, and a touch of cardamom, these cookies are crisp on the outside and light, crumbly inside.

name: Refined Flour Dry Fruit Cake
Description: Refined Flour Dry Fruit Cake is a soft, spongy, and richly flavored delight made with fine refined flour that gives it a smooth texture and perfect rise. Packed with the natural sweetness of raisins, dates, figs, and the crunch of almonds, cashews, and walnuts, every slice is a burst of flavor and festivity.

name: Pizza
Description: Pizza is a world-loved dish that combines a soft, chewy crust with a rich layer of tomato sauce, gooey melted cheese, and a variety of toppings ranging from fresh vegetables to flavorful meats. Baked to perfection, it offers the perfect balance of crispy edges, melted cheese pulls, and a burst of savory flavors in every bite.

name: Cup Cakes with Pastry Cream Topping
Description: Cupcakes with Pastry Cream Topping are the perfect blend of soft, moist cake and rich, velvety cream. Each cupcake is baked to fluffy perfection, then topped with a smooth, luscious layer of classic pastry cream that adds a luxurious touch of sweetness.

name: Almond Oats cookies and then RagiÂ cookies
Description: Almond Oats Cookies are wholesome, crunchy delights made with the nutty richness of almonds and the hearty goodness of oats. Lightly sweetened and perfectly baked, these cookies offer a balance of crunch and chewiness, making them both nutritious and satisfying.
